pages.text: $(thing)Tube modules/$ are components which can be attached to $(l:tubes/pressure_tubes)Pressure Tubes/$, either onto the side of the tube, or $(thing)inline/$ with the tube.$(p)Attached modules can be removed by $(thing)sneak+right-clicking/$ with a $(l:tools/pneumatic_wrench)Pneumatic Wrench/$.

pages.title: Inline Modules
pages.text: $(thing)Inline modules/$ are a little special, in that:$(li)A Pressure Tube may have only one inline module.$(li)A Pressure Tube with an inline module may not have any other modules.$(li)A Pressure Tube with an inline module may only be connected to on two sides: the two ends of the inline module.$(li)Inline modules may $(italic)only/$ be placed on the open end of a Pressure Tube.
